name: gcp-billing-cost-analysis
text: What are my top cost contributors in GCP?
query:
SELECT 
  project.id as project_id,
  service.description as service_type,
  sku.description as sku_description,
  SUM(cost) as total_cost_last_7days,
  SUM(cost) / 7 as daily_cost,
  (SUM(cost) / 7) * 30 as projected_monthly_cost,
  COUNT(*) as cost_entries,
  location.location as location
FROM `chip_billing.gcp_billing_export_v1_01D01E_9B88C7_8078BC`
WHERE cost > 0
  AND DATE(usage_start_time) >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
GROUP BY project_id, service_type, sku_description, location
HAVING daily_cost > 0.10
ORDER BY total_cost_last_7days DESC
LIMIT 50
